summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 35th Place Northwest, from West 60th Street to West 61st Street together with the right to make the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the abutting property in the reasonable original grading of said street, providing for the acquisition, appropriation, taking, and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor by condemnation and providing for the payment therefor.
